skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: groove one oh six
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to Groove 106 Radio, your ultimate destination for the electrifying sounds of the 80s and 90s! This new online radio station is dedicated to reviving the vibrant energy of those unforgettable decades, where iconic tracks and unforgettable rhythms defined the musical landscape. With a carefully curated playlist that includes everything from KROQ flashbacks to Hi-NRG beats, Groove 106 is your go-to source for all the classic hits that keep the dance floor alive.

Whether you’re reminiscing about the golden age of techno or getting lost in the grooves of funk and old school vibes, Groove 106 has something for everyone. We dive deep into the heart of the 80s and 90s music scene, delivering an eclectic mix that features hard house, freestyle, and those timeless bangers that make you want to move. Our DJs are passionate about bringing you the tracks that not only defined a generation but continue to inspire new ones.
priv:
